      • VertexArray

        public VertexArray(float[] vertices,
           byte[] indices,
           float[] textureCoordinates)
        Constructs a VertexArray from given data
        Parameters:
        vertices - Vertices of this mesh
        indices - Indices (drawing order) of this mesh
        textureCoordinates - Coordinates of texture sampler
